title: --\> Font designers here \<--
content:
Dear Typophile community,   
   
Fonts For Flash is looking for your talent! You can now sell your bitmap fonts to and through FFF. Please email us for more details at: [partners@fontsforflash.com](mailto:partners@fontsforflash.com) (kindly include samples of your work with your email).   
   
Thanks!   
   
Your friends at FFF,   
   
 [www.fontsforflash.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106075120/http:/www.fontsforflash.com/)
author: fonts_for_flash
